<p align="justify"> 
{{< fa address-card size=large >}} I am the LeRoy Neiman Term Chair Professor of Sociology at the University of California, Los Angeles. 
</p>

<p align="justify"> 
{{< fa chart-line size=large >}} I study culture, cognition, networks, theory, consumption, institutions, and organization.
</p>

<p align="left"> 
{{< fa graduation-cap size=large >}} PhD in Sociology, *University of Arizona*, 2006.
</p>

<p align="left"> 
{{< fa graduation-cap size=large >}} BS in Psychology, *Brooklyn College of the City University of New York*, 1997.
</p>

<p align="justify"> 
I am also:
